entry.title: Galaxy Note 8 Case Crystal Bumper Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: VRS Design
Type: Galaxy Note 8 Cases
Price: 29.99

Crystal Clear Choice

Crystal Bumper for Galaxy Note 8 is perfect for showcasing your new Galaxy by accenting the color palette with matching bumpers and a clear body that lets you show off your Galaxy Note 8. This case is also lab-tested to provide a Miltary Grade layer of defense against drops. MIL-STD 810G-516.6 compliant.
